website_summaries.verdict: Works to clean many different types of ear irritants for dogs and cats, including yeast and bacteria.
pros: Works to clean the interior of the ears and scaly spots on the skin
Gentle enough to use regularly for cleaning, but it also works to reduce effects of ear infections
Has a slight scent that's not overpowering
cons: Can occasionally cause an irritation of the skin for some sensitive pets

customer_reviews.title: This product really works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ear flush for yeast infections which she has had previously, by the fourth day my shepherd mix puppy was no longer scratching her ears and the redness and irritation was gone. I continued to use it the full 7 days and the cotton swabs were coming out clean by day five. Saved me a lot on a trip to the vet. Would recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Christine Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Yorkie because she had a mild ear infection and used it for a few days. Her ears started smelling awful. My vet said that since her ear canals are deep, this worsened her infection or just didn't treat it at all. Dogs that have deep ear canals need a product that can self dry deep in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: This product really helped my Labrador Retrievers. Labs are ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped my Labrador Retrievers. Labs are know for ear infections because they are water dogs. I use to have to take them to the VET and spend over $300 each just to get a medicine to stop the infection. Well this product take the infection away within a week with no VET visits required. I highly recommending trying this ear treatment. Thank You Curaseb!
customer_reviews.author: rural_one

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of floppy eared beagles that have recurrent battles with cruddy ears. Over the years, I have tried various different cleaners, vet-prescribed greasy meds, etc. I received this product three days ago, began applying it, and the dogs' ear problems are 90 percent gone. It is easy to use as well, and the dogs don't seem to mind ear cleaning time as much. I'm a happy camper with it and will continue to use. The scent is also very pleasant. I would recommend it to my friends who are pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: My tibetan terrier has had recurrent ear infections since I moved to a more humid climate 3 years ago. I had used another product that necessities a trip to the vet for a prescription ($$$!!) I saw this and ordered it, and it works! I clean her ears with it 2x week and have had no problem for 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Medicine Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple products to get rid of my dogs yeast infections in her ears and NOTHING worked. This is the first product that has truly stood by it's word. Her ears are nice and clean, no more shaking her head like she is miserable. The scent is very nice as well. I would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone who has an issue with yeast!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I waited almost 2 weeks to post a review and I can gladly report that this stuff works. My English Bulldog Lola suffers from chronic ear infections and I started using this stuff right after she got the last round of antibiotics. So far, no dark smelly gunk coming out her ears and she lets me apply the treatment with no issues which makes me believe that it makes her feel good too. Smells great as well. Glad I tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of ear mites.
customer_reviews.text: My pug had a strong ,heavy black earwax/discharge for over a ear. I have been cleaning it with different ear wash and peroxide to no evil. After reading a lot of articles I found out it was ear mites.I tried this product once a day for a week,after that every other day for a week and twice a week for 2 weeks after. After the first week the black wax was GONE! I was expected to black ear wax to return later on on. but it didn't. It has been over 2 months now where I clean the dogs ear every 7-10 days and still not a single tiny black spot.We are Ear mites Free for over 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Caused a severe reaction in the ear!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION... Has no hydrocortiszone to reduce inflamation. Used this on one of my dogs. I followed the instructions and the product totally inflamed the entire ear to a very tender, bright red color. I called my vet and he told me that these particuler ingredients must be buffered with an anti-inflamitory, of which this has none.
customer_reviews.author: NukeDog

customer_reviews.title: Has added fragrances...
customer_reviews.text: Has fragrance in it. Fragrances are NOT recommended for in dog ears and can actually aggravate any infections.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella

customer_reviews.title: ... given the lack of reviews but I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I honestly almost didn't buy it given the lack of reviews but I am so glad I did. Not only did it work but the redness and swelling went down with just one dose. I couldn't recommend this more. If you suspect your dog has a yeast ear infection this is the stuff to use. My puppy is very happy now to have the itchy yuckiness gone.
customer_reviews.author: Nyx’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first to try it but after the first dosage there was a great difference. First
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic!!!! I have a small fox wire terrier and last time I took him to the vet for the same issue the bill was over $200. I was skeptical at first to try it but after the first dosage there was a great difference. First, the smell went away quickly, oh boy did the little guy smell. Then he stopped scratching his ear. Roughly through the 4th day it was practically gone. You have to do it twice a day as directed for it to work. So far it hasn't come back. We still don't know what caused it. It was a type of ear wax that built up overnight. Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shortcaek

customer_reviews.title: NO LABEL NO DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my package it was a solid white bottle with no label or directions. I'm not even sure if I want to put this in my dogs ears now.
customer_reviews.author: Audrii

customer_reviews.title: NO LABEL, NO INSTRUCTIONS, NOTHING!!!
customer_reviews.text: mine arrived with no instructions and no labels on the white bottle.
customer_reviews.author: kitty cat

customer_reviews.title: Finally drops that work
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is f-ing amazing. It arrived on a Monday and we put it in our dog's ears. Now she's been fighting stinky ears all five years of her life. After swabbing her ears with q-tips and finding them cleaner we did it again on Tuesday. One week later cleaned her ears and they were still clean. She even passed the sniff test- no stink. We're sold on these ear drops. Only wishing we had found them sooner. Had been using drops prescribed by the vet all this years without success and after two applications she's much, much better. If you're skeptical- don't be. These really work.
customer_reviews.author: chuckmatthews

customer_reviews.title: Best product for ear infection treatment I've ever found!!
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua has had yeast infection in his ears forever it seems. Dr has treated with antibiotics and creams but nothing helped, until I found this! I started to notice he was more active and not scratching at his ears all the time. I check him often and flush his ears and clean them up and he is so much better. Of course, now he avoids me because he thinks I'm coming for his ears, but that is worth it to get him some relief if not cured!! Thank goodness I found this stuff and it is a large bottle, but I will be buying more when I need it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my Pitbull!
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull gets horribly itchy and irritated ears. I do not want to go to the vet every time his ears are getting on his nerves. I ordered this to try out and now I use it on all of my dogs. It helped after just one use! He was able to go to bed the first night of use without messing with his ears at all. Highly recommend to save trips to the vet!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Spazzer

customer_reviews.title: It works better than what I have gotten at the vets office.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to treat our Siamese cats' ears. It immediately works on the male who has some minor irritation in his ears. I use it more frequently with the female who has chronic issues with her ears. Word of caution, you will end up wearing a good deal of it because its a pretty thin liquid and they start shaking their heads before I can get the bottle pulled back. Keep this in mind if you were glasses, you will be cleaning them right after.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Have tried a lot of remedies and this one is simple, cost effective and smells pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. Following the instructions it seemed to clear up a reoccuring yeast infection in my dogs ears quickly. Though I did not have the heart to apply twice a day, once a day seemed to clear it up still within the first week. Did not seem to affect her as much after the first 2 applications. She is a golden doodle and rubs all over the carpet when her ears are messed with. Lasted about 30 minutes the first application and only a few minutes after the 3rd application. Smell disappeared and she is back to her normal self.
customer_reviews.author: William Poteet

customer_reviews.title: A week of Daly use has left a happier Shadow Girl
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old lab mix, known as Shadow Girl, has been using this ear infection treatment for the past week. The first couple of days there was no noticible improvement. Her ears had become incrusted. Then it appeared the crusty layer had softened, and during the rinse we were able to remove (shudder) lots of guck with some cotton balls. In the days since, her head shaking has decreased and she has stopped trying to gouge at her ears. It’s too early to judge how the treatment will help long term, but for now Shadow Girl gives this product 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Terri Rene DaVar-Howard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear cleaner. Good for itching.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and one small dog. The two cats have continual wax and debris buildup and need ear cleaning regularly (especially the cat with a canal which is partially blocked by scar tissue). With the Curaseb none of my pets objected to a squirt of liquid in each ear, followed by massaging the ears and cleaning them. The cat with scar tissue normally scratches me when I clean her blocked ear. So, cleaning takes several attempts. With Curaseb she is much calmer and it is easier to remove the debris, wax, etc. A welcome change for her and me. She is prone to ear infections.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Made Infection MUCH Worse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my dog had a mild ear infection. I followed the directions on the bottle, and it just kept getting worse. I finally took him to the vet because he was crying from pain, and the vet said the ear flush had caused his inner ear to swell up and caused more damage. I was lucky I took him in then because he was THIS CLOSE to having permanent damage to his ear. A massive vet bill later, I threw out the bottle and will never use this product again. If you're looking for an ear flush, use another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This product did not help my dogs ears and I am not sure but it may have caused her more pain. Customer service told me they would take care of me if it did not work but they did not reply to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: A last resort that worked
customer_reviews.text: My maltese has had chronic ear infections for about 3 years now. Nothing worked for long. I bought this and started seeing results in a few days. The swelling went down and she itches a lot less. I now clean her ears with this product about once a week and she seems much better. Her ears are pink, not swollen shut and she rarely itches.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Loew

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well! Initially we were spraying it in her ear and leaving her alone but it was making her ear infection worse. I then realized by sprayingit in her ear it was temporarily liquifying her ear gunk, which you then have to manually clean out. It was crazy how well it liquified her ear gunk though! Once we did this for a few days it went away.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our dog
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we suspected our dog (a floppy eared good boy of a Beagle) had an ear infection. The bottle said it was formulated to be anti-bacterial, anti-microbial, and anti-fungal. While it did keep his ear clean with daily use, it did not cure the infection. We used the product for the recommended two-week period, then had to take him to the vet for antibiotics. If you just want a product to keep your pet's ears clean, this is a good one. If you think your dog has an actual ear infection, or if after the two weeks you still don't see improvement, definitely take your dog in for a check-up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT TAKE CARE OF EAR MITES!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the "ear mite" mention in product description, however, the product once it arrived, DOES NOT INCLUDE EAR MITE on the label. I am promptly returning this due to inaccurate description. I notice OTHER people have complained about the same thing...
customer_reviews.author: troy schoeneberger

customer_reviews.title: Possible allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time dog owner and wanted to prevent a yeast infection as my puppies ears were starting to smell sweet. When I used the product he didn’t seem to mind, shook his head a bit and rubbed his face on the ground. The next day though the insides of his ears were bright red as if they were irritated. I’m not planning on using this product again in case he’s allergic. He’s already on Benadryl daily for allergies as well so it makes me worried his ears still turned red.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Hahn

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. His ears are clean and he doesn't shake ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this product been? My dog has had chronic ear problems for years. He has a bath every week to try and keep his ears clean. This product is awesome. His ears are clean and he doesn't shake his head at all anymore. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for saving my Labrador's summer!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm a cynic, since I'm so accustomed to products making much bigger promises than they can actually fulfill.I live in a lakefront house with my 2-year-old Yellow Lab, who is quite prone to ear infections from her daily swims. I took her to the vet, and $350 later, was told to keep her out of the lake for six weeks (mid-summer--ain't gonna happen!) and prescribed a small bottle of ear wash that contained identical ingredients to this much larger bottle (Curaseb). After just over a week, no more smell, no more head-shaking and ear-scratching. This product did just what it promised and I'm sure glad we found it!
customer_reviews.author: CroonerDude

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old Cavalier King Charles mix and with her beautiful floppy ears we have a lot of ear infections. I discovered Curaseb ear flush which I use every other day with daily ear cleaner to prevent ear infections. She was recently groomed and a few days later developed crusty bumps on her back. Took her to the Vet. She was treated with both an oral anti fungal and antibiotic. Bumps went away but started coming back after medication was finished. So I started rubbing in the Curaseb ear cleaner on her bumps and they started disappearing. She only has 2 bumps left so I am confident with daily treatment it will clear up. Thank you Curaseb!
customer_reviews.author: Coll

customer_reviews.title: Cure Dog Ear Infections
customer_reviews.text: My hound gets recurring ear infections with thick black goo that starts falling out of his ears about 3 times a year. I have tried numerous home remedies, peroxide and other suggested treatments, but usually have to take him to the vet for meds and treatment. This stuff cleared up an initial infection I noticed (I check his ears daily) after only 3 treatments with a small amount of product applied once a day. No black goo and it also dried up the usual fluid collection at the base of the ear. Great stuff and saved me about 130.00 for a vet visit and medication prescription. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Perry C.

customer_reviews.title: Ear infection cleared w/o antibiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have King Charles Cavaliers. They are prone to frequent ear issues. As soon as I smell (that smell) yeast, I begin cleaning their ears. I had run out of my trusted brand and was unable to reorder due to 'out of stock' Bought this product as an alternative. Recently one of the pups had an infection that got ahead of me. I took her to the vet and he saw resolution of the infection and encourages me to keep doing what I was doing. This was at the point I sought vet advice.(drainage, yuck, stink) Nice peach smell. No tea tree oil. (one is sensitive). I will continue this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: My labradoodle puppy has something going on in his ears...most likely yeast infection. This product smelled nice and was easy to use but ultimately used it everyday twice a day for 10 days and there was no improvement with his ear. On one hand using this product and keeping his ears clean did help him as he wasn't itchy and stopped scratching his ear during the period of treatment but I have to move on to another product and hope that something else will knock out his infection completely.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than anything the vet gave me!
customer_reviews.text: I admittedly was skeptical when I got this bottle of what seemed like water. But I followed the instructions of putting this into my dog's ear, massaging it in, and then he walked off and shook his head. A few days later --- no kidding --- his ears were cleared. I am a total believer! Now whenever I see him starting to rub his ears I immediately begin treatment, but honestly the incidents of ear infections have decreased!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to please
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bathed our 1yr old hound and got water inside his ears. A week later I noticed a foul smell in his ear. The inside of his ear was bright red and warm. Bought this as an attempt to avoid the vet visit fee. We used it every morning and night on his ear for about 8 straight days and his ear went right back to normal. I highly recommend this for simple ear infections for water. Continued use is required to get control of the bacteria, so dont skip any days!!
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't helped
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for 1 1/2 weeks. As of late no improvement with my German Shepherds ears. When I clean her ears with the product she cries as if it burns. And afterwards runs and starts rubbing her ears in the grass and crying as if she is in pain. I continue to use hoping it will help her.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this item. I would try to clean my dogs ears and it was just so nasty/dirty/smelly. I got this item on June 7. Today is June 9 and the cotton ball is almost clear!!!! My poor dog was miserable. I have to admit I was not 100% sure of this treatment but it absolutely works!! Sure beats $200 vet bill !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! Got a dog with an ear infection get this
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for our 12 year old golden retriever, Emma likes to swim and got herself a bad ear infection from swimming in the pond. This stuff cleared that up super quick, has a nice smell to it, and came in a substantially large container unlike other items or products I felt comfortable liberally using this oh, I am so happy we bought it. Emma is feeling much better now
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Left my dogs ears clean and smelling good!
customer_reviews.text: My golden had a persistent problem with a yeast infection in both her ears. It didn’t seem to bother her at all, but boy did her ears stink. The vet sold me these greasy drops to treat her ears, which left the hair around her ears a greasy mess. They also told me to deep clean her ears, which is what I purchased this product for. Let me tell you, her ears have never been so clean or smelled so good. And no greasy stuff to leak into her surrounding hair.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Golden!
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retriever has been miserable with her ears for a time now. We've tried a couple different products and have spent lots of time cleaning them out. Nothing was really working. I found this product online and thought it seemed worth a try. For the first two weeks or so (and much to her chagrin) we did her ears each evening. We've backed off to about every three days or so. No more head shaking or scratching. Very little grossness coming out of her ears when we clean them. As of now, we're very happy. And she seems much more content! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Horne

customer_reviews.title: Stops the ear scratching
customer_reviews.text: I've used three products for my long ear pointer ear problems and this works best, lasts longest before scratching begins again. We like that it's a cleaner, not a steroid, which we also use occasionally. It's low viscosity, like water, so flows into the ear easily. I use an animal syringe for 3 ml each ear to be consistent and conserve product. Will continue to buy more. I only use a day or two and then wait for scratching to begin again which takes maybe a month.
customer_reviews.author: the fly

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS>
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonderfully for my Maltese/Poodle mix ears. I thought he would scramble his brains by shaking his head so often. We had tried another product previously, and it made his ear very sore. Thanks for being on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: See a Vet First, then use this to clean the ear.  Not effective for correcting ear infections.
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure, I don't feel that the product work to kill infection. It seemed more like a watered down ear rinse. Used it for a while and the infection was still there. Had to take to vet to get a prescription and it cleared right up. Sometimes natural may be a good alternative, but when you need to fix the problem, see a vet the use this as a follow up for cleaning the ear on a regular schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin F. Long III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pug and his ears were just straight up disgusting. I did some googling and found this product to have the most stars and some great reviews. Well, here's another great review. Within 3 to 4 days of using it, his ears don't stink and there's nothing coming out of them on the doggy qtips. I think we'll check him tonight and if theres nothing I will only need doing this once a week!! Top notch and saved me a ton of money from going to the vet!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Velardo

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery and soothing ear rinse for my Pyrenees. ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and soothing ear rinse for my Pyrenees. My dog had chronic rubbing of his ears prior to my use of this ear rinse. He has not shook his head or presented with a musty odor in the past 3 days. I’ve been wiping his ears out 2x daily for past 3 days. I will do this for 2 more days. Then clean his ears 1 time weekly.
customer_reviews.author: One Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm smells gooood!! & it works, LOL
customer_reviews.text: Well so far my diving doodle who I can't keep from diving to the bottom of pool, lol enjoys! He gets swimmers ear every year so I was looking for a dryer of his ear cannels. I have been using this every time he gets out of the pool for the day which is just about everyday in south Florida. No more swimmers ear & pain for my furry child. It also has a very pleasurable aroma if your dog has a stinky ear. Hope this helps, enjoy
customer_reviews.author: chauncey2

customer_reviews.title: It works , plain and simple.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say more about this brand of products. I've basically bought every product for my dog they sell. As I've said on other reviews their products saved our dog and our sanity. My dogs hair loss is no more and hos hind area has new thick hair growing in. No more constant itching. If your dog itches like ours and you've tried diets, fish oil , praying , offering your soul to fix it , look no more this line of sprays cured my dogs skin problems within days. Will be a lifetime customer, 10 stars handsdown , all their products.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: More effective than the well -known costlier alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about two months now. I had always used the pricier competitor for my yellow lab and since I had to use it every day of the week to keep her ears well, I switched to this cheaper version. I used this every day for approximately two weeks and quickly realized her ears were completely well. I decided to keep up with how long it would be before she needed it again since the other brand required daily use and knock on wood it has been about a month and a half and she is still doing great and I’m so happy that she finally has some relief! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Julu213

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My poor BFF has floppy ears and has for years suffered from what I now expect to be yeast likely from his dog food, even though it's one of the best without a prescription. I haven't had much success with a competitor's solution for ear mites, but after several days of using Cursaseb, I saw amazing results and improvement. My BFF finds it much less irritating than a homemade water and apple cider vinegar solution ear wash.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Prevost

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Love the screw-top nozzle. Other washes I’ve used had a tiny cap that either never stayed on or was at risk of getting washed down the drain. Plus since you don’t have to cut the tip off there’s no sharp edge to scratch or poke your dog’s ear. YouTube how to fill and massage the ear canal and then let your dog shake it out and rinse with water. Chunks of nasty ear wax came flying out and my dog didn’t run around scrtching or shaking his head for a day. Best of all the product has a nice melon scent.
customer_reviews.author: Bartab

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works for my pitbull puppy
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old pitbull was having such nasty purulent ear drainage and smelly. The skin of the ear was dried out and flaky. He would itch at it and it would bleed. I would hear him constantly shaking his ears at night. I would guess it was an infected ear. I tried burts brees cleaning solution, religiously twice daily for 7 days with no luck. Unable to get into the vet bc if Covid. I gave this a shot. Literally 2 days of use and his ears are immaculate. Never reoccured. This stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal F

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Has a great scent that’s not medicinal or too strong. Was one of the most gentle cleaners my dog has had to endure. Sadly, it’s not working for her ears right now but I’m confident that it may come in useful down the road. It’s VERY thin and like water so BEFORE you shake it out finger tip on top of closed cap. If not, it will sprinkle out as you shake. This didn’t cause any irritation to a bad ear infection but does help thin, clear the debris away. Generous sized bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Pyr Lover

customer_reviews.title: Really clears the ears
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that for years have had ears that gunked up with that black brown waxy stuff. I use another good product for my other dogs. Their ears are healthy. My two with sick ears are cleared up thanks to Curaseb! I wasn't always that good about using it regular. It still worked! On an off note as this is a product for the ears; My Sophie started getting some crusty black spots on the skin. I am sure it was a fungus. I put the Curaseb on the spots once a day. 3 days gone! Highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I'd rather it was unscented. But overall it's the best ear wash for dogs and cats. I use a baby wipe that's been soaked down good with it...then I wring it out way down in there and I wipe out the ears...I have 4 wolf hybrids and a bottle of this stuff goes a long way plus they kindve like it I think.
customer_reviews.author: River Raven

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is not possible to follow the application recommendations, not for my dog, I did used a soaked cotton ball to apply and clean her ears and paws. It seemed to stop her scratching and ear-flapping IMMEDIATELY!! This has been a long-term issue over 4 years and we have used MANY products, changed her diet multiple times only to have the black goo return over and over. The vet wanted her to have expensive "allergy" medication for the rest of her life, without even trying to find the cause of the problem. So, yes, whether it's yeast, ear mites, fungus, or a mystery "allergy" I highly recommend you give this product a try!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S. Kime

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Curaseb!
customer_reviews.text: The inside of my pit’s ears were filled with a waxy pus and her ears smelled as well. She was always scratching and shaking her to the point I was worried about her damaging her brain. The fur around her ears had receded which suggested she may even have ear mites. Someone I met at the pet store suggested I try this product. I noticed the results immediately. I used it o her two a day and by the fourth day her eyes were completely fine. It’s been a month since her last use and so far her ears look great. No redness, no wax, no pus and no more ear scratching or head shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneomac35

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We have a beagle. That means big floppy ears with little air getting into the inner ears. She goes out and runs rabbits every day. That means muck and dirt and, and, and. When the dogs ears get to the point she is constantly shaking her head and scratching at her ears we use this stuff for a few days. After a few days her ears are clean inside and she is at peace. We are at peace. She does not seem to have any adverse side effects from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: At the end of my rope with my yorkipoo ear infection. 2 years and hundred of dollars later I found Curaseb and thought why not order it, cant hurt and Ive tried everything else. My dog literally stopped the constant head shaking and rubbing ear on couch after first time using it. Someone needs to tell Veterinarians about this product. Seriously, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: My English Bulldog has been suffering from alot of yeasty, fungal ear infections this year. Rather than run him down to the vet every other week I decided to give this a try. Just one or two uses and the redness and swelling reduces every time!!! After a few uses once a day, his ears clear up. Easy to use... he hates having his ears cleaned and runs when he sees the bottle. I just have to squirt it in and massage his ears for a minute and then let him run and shake. He hates it but he has healthy ears again!!
customer_reviews.author: mlb23

customer_reviews.title: Unstunk my Springer...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old Springer Spaniel has had periodic problems with his ears. He refuses to be brushed, so the 'punishment' is a total shave in the spring and fall. The hair growth in his ears, however, had him shaking his head & scratching for a month or so prior to his salon appointment - and they smelled BAD... This product 100% cured the issue. A week of daily flush - filling, rubbing it in, then soaking up the crud with paper towels worked perfectly. He now gets once-a-week maintenance with this stuff...and no further stink, shake, or scratch...
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: No strong smell and no strong chemicals! Great for picky dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had before and after pictures! If you had taken a damp cloth to our german shepherd's ear it would look like dirt had built up overnight and he was miserable! He usually doesn't enjoy treatments and doesn't tolerate strong chemicals due to the sensitivity. This ear wash smells fresh and clean, doesn't cause discomfort for my dog and after the first treatment, his ear is stunningly nicer than the day before! No new buildup occurred and it was clearing up of the fungal growths overnight! We are on his 4th wash now and his ear is virutally back to normal!
customer_reviews.author: neverseenthesun

customer_reviews.title: Great for ear infections and regular maintenance
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd gets ear infections a few times a year and what they give us at the vet never seems to stop them so I thought I’d try something different. After just a few days of using this, you could tell that she was getting better. I noticed her ears looked a lot less irritated and she stopped digging at them. After 10 days, I believe the ear infection is completely gone. I will definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ear infection free!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old dog kept having ear infections. Vet diagnoses seemed to vary but she always smelled like a nacho. Last vet said it was fungus on her skin travelling to ear. She is now on rice and turkey homemade dog food combined with curaseb rinse once or twice weekly. Happy to report she is itch and infection free! I keep extra bottles of curaseb on hand as a preventative.
customer_reviews.author: Karin C. Adler

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL
customer_reviews.text: So my mini schnauzer had a huge ear infection, his ear was pretty bad and so after using this product his ears cleared up so much! I cannot recommend this product enough, it will save you from unnecessary expenses at the vet! and trust me, ive paid my fare share in vet expenses for ear infections with my golden retriever...I wish I knew about this product sooner. I also use Zymox otic ear treatment along with this...Altogether I paid for both products roughly around $37 vs $80 at the least when I go to the vet with the same problem (ear infections)
customer_reviews.author: Constantine Lyashchina

customer_reviews.title: Curaseb keeps my dog ear clean!
customer_reviews.text: My beagle mix had chronic ear infection on the first day I adapted him. It always come back with a vengeance after vet's medication. This time with the combination of Osurnia and Curaseb , I finally got it under control. Osurnia is a prescription medication that was deposited in my dog's ear, which totally got rid of the infection and after that wore out, I just use Curaseb to clean my dog's ear once a week and no more brown goo and foul smell in my dog's ears!
customer_reviews.author: Philip C.

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to usually write reviews, but this product is a miracle worker! With the current stresses about going out in public, I was nervous to take my elderly golden retriever border collie mix to the vet for an ear infection. Within 3 days of using the product the yeast had started to clear up and my dog had stopped whimpering. The whole mess was cleared up within a week. This product was fast and effective. The smell isn’t great, but that is fairly non consequential
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Heaps

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell and it works
customer_reviews.text: This ear infection treatment has nearly eliminated my Silkypoos ear problems. She has had reoccurring infections for over 5 years with multiple vet visits and medications. The infection and smelly ear problems always returned. I used Curaseb about every other day in her ears for a few months now. It has gotten rid of the odor and extra production of ear gook. It has a nice smell and is very gentle. Highly recommended by a happy dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. So inexpensive, and I love that it is not oily at all. It has been working just as well as prescribed drugs of the past (mometax?) and less gross because it does not leave everything oily and goopy. TIP: once a vet told us that the most important thing to remember when cleaning a dogs ears is to rub into down into the ear for as long as possible. Rub right under your dogs ear to break up anything inside. If you don’t really rub it down into the ear canal it takes much longer and is much more ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Marginal results for chronic condition
customer_reviews.text: Out 8-year-old Golden Retriever has had a chronic fungal ear infection in his right ear from the time we adopted him 6 months ago. The ear was constantly inflamed and produced a lot of exudate. None of the meds (Baytril) or ear cleanings performed by our Veterinarian worked. So we tried Zymox and saw no improvement. Then we tried Curaseb over the course of two weeks and saw only marginal improvement in that the exudate seemed to diminish and the ear smelled better. We took the dog back to our Vet who performed a surgical Zepp procedure. Now, two weeks post-op, the ear seems significantly improved.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Albright

customer_reviews.title: Works for my pup.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. This product seems to stop the itching in my beagles ears. She runs away when I approach her with the bottle because she doesn't like anything damp in her ears. However, I catch her and proceed to clean her ears. Beagles are not known to be real smart. Hopefully, some day she will realize that the stuff in the blue bottle is what is giving her some relief from the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: It does wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different remedies from items bought the pet shop to home remedies. Curaseb did wonders on my dog's ear. Her left ear was extremely bloody looking, clogged up, has thick gunk in her ear and since I've used this product in the last month or so. It's been clearing up and i see less gunk in her ear. The product suggests twice a day but since I forget one I go to work I do once a day and occasionally skip one day. The scent smells so good! I wish I had a shampoo like that. Its fresh and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Annasus

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy. Scratching eased almost immediately and stopped completely in ...
customer_reviews.text: My Zuchon had had ear allergies/infections every summer. Many expensive vet bills. I decided to try this product after reading the reviews. I'm very happy. Scratching eased almost immediately and stopped completely in a couple days. Has a nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sharen Wilde

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My lab pup was continuously getting ear infections which meant trips to the vet until I found this product. Although he hates getting it squirted into his ear it works fantastically as a cleaner or on an full blown infection. If you have a dog that gets ear infections this is a great product to save on vet bills.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried EVERYTHING with my German Shepherds ears!! The Vet could never find anything wrong but she scratched & cried almost non-stop. I stumbled across this & although my dog is not a fan, I love it! No more itching, no more crying, I just have to chase her around the house because she hates having it put in her ears (as well as all other drops we have tried in the past). On the plus side, the smell is great! We end up covered in it by the time it gets in her ears!!
customer_reviews.author: ck1010

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick for my doggy's ears
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very sensitive ears. Every several months, he gets some kind of an ear infection. This ear wash helped him out so much. I flushed his ears out with this every day for about a week and a half and my pup was way better. It is a clear water like liquid and is not sticky. It also dries fairly fast it's not all stick on the dog's ear area. There is a nozzle for easy application. I will most like purchase this again when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rains

customer_reviews.title: Saving on vet bills
customer_reviews.text: After two days of use on my reluctant dog... His ears aren’t itchy and he’s letting me do this without the fits he threw at first. The vet NEVER told us how to clean his ears or that products like this were available. Instead, they’d collect 300 per visit with a straight face. My dog hasn’t been this content in awhile, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: LWAddict

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a female GSD that has been having ear issues for years. Used vet medicine which only worked temporarily. Poor thing her ears got so bad I put some cortisone cream on to help with the itching. She would scratch the ears raw. Vicious circle. I spotted this on Amazon while looking to buy more of the other stuff. Oh my gosh this has done wonders for her ears. They are healing and I see pink now, healthy pink. Thank you to the makers of this wonderful product. Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tanker

customer_reviews.title: Curaseb was the answer to my dogs stinky ears.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 18 month old Rottweiler, she is a inside dog and regularly gets a wipe down with homemade all natural oils/ water mix, just a spritz or two. The problem I'm having is with stinky ears. I always try to clean as good as I possibly can without risking hurting her. I ordered Curaseb and immediately following the first treatment, I could definitely see a difference in irritation and odor. After she got through shaking her head, I wiped her head off and her ears smelled a million times better. I am treating her twice a day as directed and so far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mosteller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent! My dachshund was having issues with some kind of fungal infection, after different baths and products a friend of mine who's a vet tech recommended this. This was a final attempt before he went to the vet. I'm so happy to have tried this. Noodle has clear skin, clear ears and isn't itchy anymore! I am so happy I decided to give this a try. Noodle is a much happier pup!
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog ear cleaner Ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this product for our puggle's intermittent ear gunk problem 2 times now (the first was well over a year ago). Just once a day cleaning with a cotton ball and squirting some down into the ear to squish/massage around works so well we have lent the bottle to multiple friends...also with awesome results. Matter or fact, that's the reason we "ran out" of the first one. If your dog has that brown stinky mess in their ears, and this stuff doesn't help them, you need veterinary attention (but they're most likely going to suggest a product such as this). For the price and efficacy, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I saw great improvement after the first use and my girls ears ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this before paying for vet visit. I saw great improvement after the first use and my girls ears are cleared up after just 3 days. It is gentle, doesn't seem to have any harsh chemicals that hurt her - she doesn't mind having her ears cleaned with this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Beth R

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for my dog who has sensitive skin and chronic problems with her ears. She despises drops in her ears so I split or use a thin cotton round making sure it is free of any loose cotton pieces. Then I soak it with this product and very gently and with great care (and an accompanying treat) clean her ears thoroughly. Relief for her has finally come. Happy dog and her person!
customer_reviews.author: E Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month dog has suffered from incredibly smelly, itchy, dry, and flaky ears for months. I’ve tried adding vaseline, cleaning, and using pet MD ear wipes. Did not work at all. This bottle however worked right away and has been consistent! Her ears finally smell good, are clean and soft, and don’t itch anymore. This medicine even makes her smell good as if she just got a bath. Thank you so much to the creators of this product. My baby finally is relaxed and clean. If you are thinking about buying, do it! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Poor Pluto has terrible problems with his cockapoo ears. Most OTC ear cleaners have ingredients that cause intense inflammation and burning for some dogs. Pluto manufactures so much smelly ear wax, that it’s hard to keep them clean. (Plus, he likes to “surf” the carpets on his ears when they itch). I can’t tell you how much I treasure this product! It’s not cheap - nor should it be. It’s so worth a few extra bucks for loosening Pluto’s sticky, thick wax, quickly and without pain.
customer_reviews.author: mE, yoU & TiTuS (♥️PluTo)

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it few months ago and didn't provide any rating because I wasn't sure if it really works after just one use. I have two dogs. As soon as they start their had shaking and keep shaking, I use it one time in each ear. The shaking goes away just after one use. I tried many products that you have to use it then after 5 min. put in your animal ears again. That was really challenging for me because which dog likes to pour liquid in his/hers ears?? LOL. This is really one time use. I am so happy that I bought it for my dogs sake and mine. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: IZS2018

customer_reviews.title: Works guickly
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my Chihuahua whose ear was a little red and had some wax in it and the very first time it cleaned her ear out nice,waited 2days and did it again and hardly nothing came out,waited 2more days and absolutely nothing came out, she doesn't do any head shaking or scratching at her ear,best stuff I ever used,never buy anything again,well worth the money,I spent $147.00 at vet and wasted my money,then I found this,better then the vets
customer_reviews.author: gladys decarolis

customer_reviews.title: Great priduct, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I will buy this again. Light nice scent and cleans better then any war cleaner I have used in my dogs. I have used nearly every type in my 25 years of breeding. This one gently loosens the grime making cleaning easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works miracles!
customer_reviews.text: My dog oddly had a reoccurring ear infection. The vet cleaned it out and applied medication and after 2 weeks, it still returned. We went back, and they did the same thing. After forking over a bill for the visitation and medication twice, we decided to search online and happy that we did because we came across this. We only used it that one time for about a week and a half. Been over a year since last application and my dog has not gotten an ear infection since then. This works miracles! It also has a pleasent scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four sets of antibiotics and THIS DID THE TRICK!
customer_reviews.text: When we moved up north our dog began to get chronic yeast infections in his ears. After $2000 in vet bills, and multiple types of antibiotics we were desperate for a cure. THIS IS THE CURE. It worked immediately. He stopped shaking his head, digging in her ears, and all the other tell tale signs within 24 hours. We use it once a week now just in case. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MilitaryMomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Works great...dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lab with chronic ear yeast infections. This has been the only non-prescription solution that has worked well. The hound hates it and will run away when he sees me with bottle in hand. There is no need to dry the ear because he shakes his head like crazy. You have to dive away after you dose him. But, it keeps the infection away far longer than anything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Alsand

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for a minor ear infection
customer_reviews.text: My pooch had infections in both ears. I used this product on him for more than a month. One side eventually cleared up but the other side got worse. In the end I took him to the vet and they recommended Zymox Plus HC, which cleared up the other side in less than a week. 3 stars because it kinda worked, but the other stuff I used was so much better. That stuff was a lot more expensive though, and it wasn't a Prime product so it took a little longer getting to me.
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is the third ear infection medicine i have tried for my dog and so far it's the best. The other two only seemed to mask the problem but not really fix it. So it would seem the ear was better but wasn't really. When I first used this on my dog he actually smiled as it gave him insant relief. He seems so much more himself and I am so happy because it was so hard seeing him in pain. Would buy again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Maddy B

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year-old lab all the sudden has smelly ears, he was shaking his head all the time and he was scratching his ears all the time that he had sores on the inside of his ear. His ears were all red and irritated. Was it yeast? Fungal? After many reviews I decided on this product. I used it for a week and it TOTALLY cleared up his ears. He has been clear now for over 4 months and I have not needed to use the product again. Saved me a trip to the vet. Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: PVMom

customer_reviews.title: Been using on ears and paws
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog, who has allergies and ends up with ear infection quite often. Even though I gave her an antihistamine, she got smart and I would find little flat capsules. So I discontinued the capsules. She has been shaking her head for the past week and no matter what brand we were using, she just kept shaking her head, which indicated they were not working. So, we are trying this and after a few days, the shaking has eased up tremendously. I started putting it on her paws too, but I can't tell that it is doing much for them. I will use the bottle and make the determination.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This worked for our dog
customer_reviews.text: We took our maltipoo dog to the groomers and after a few days he developed a foul smell in his ears. I looked at them and they were filled with brown wax. Maybe the groomer irritated them or didn’t do a good job cleaning but I wanted to try something first before taking him to the vet and paying big bucks. I found this and used it to flush his ears daily for about a week and the smell and wax was gone. I still use it periodically to clean his ears and they smell great now. It was a great purchase and saved me so much money on vet bills.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Phan

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this but it just didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: Sigh. I wanted to love this product. Unfortunately, it didn't work for my pup's ears. I'm not going to slam this product, it may very well work for your fur-baby. It's a fairly large container and the scent is pleasing. EDIT: I've had to edit this review 5+ times because Amazon keeps hiding it under their sensitivity filter. Will THIS edit be the charm?
customer_reviews.author: AlisaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A real money saver
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth to the vet for my little female dachshund's ear problems and yeast on her mouth and tummy. I don't have to tell you these once a month trip was costing a small fortune. I did some research and found this product. I thought it was worth a try. I have purchased 3 of these and will continue to use it on her. She has had no issues since we started using this.
customer_reviews.author: BwM

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My fathers dog was rubbing her ear on the grass because it was bothering her. I bought this product due to the great reviews. I can’t believe the next morning her ears were so much cleaner and she wasn’t rubbing them. I’ve cobtinued to apply to her ears for a few days to make sure everything is under control. This product works way better than the vets prescription and so much cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: Just me!

customer_reviews.title: SOMETHING THAT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: my rescue had ear infections for YEARS untreated. After multiple rounds of meds, he almost died from this ridiculously strong medication they put him on to try and wipe out his ear infection. We stopped everything so we wouldn't lose him. A friend suggested we try this wash. I was floored at what a difference it made! Saved us a ton of money and he's much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lil_lizzie

product_meta.title: Curaseb Veterinary Cat & Dog Ear Infection Treatment – Treats Infections from Ear Mites, Yeast, Fungus and Bacteria – Broad Spectrum Veterinary Formula
product_meta.description: Curaseb Antiseptic Ear Flush is antifungal and antibacterial that treats active ear infections.
feature_bullets: Eliminates Ear Infections, Inflammation, Wax Buildup & Redness caused by Fungus, Yeast, Bacteria and Ear Mites
Treats Smelly Ears, Itchiness, Head Shaking & Discharge by flushing away Unwanted Visitors, Ear Wax, Dirt and Accumulated Biofilms
Perfect for Routine Ear Cleaning especially after swims and baths
No Sting Veterinary Formula is safe for Dogs, Puppies, Cats & Kittens
